sub_title: Thought Leader | CEO | NED | ESG, Startups, Smart Cities, EVs, Mobility | M&A, Strategy, BD, Policy, Expansion
summary:
🌟 Passionate Leader | Strategic Visionary | Global Technology & Mobility Innovator 🌟

Welcome to my LinkedIn profile! I am Rajarshi Rakesh Sahai, a seasoned executive with a proven track record in driving transformational change, fostering innovation, and creating strategic partnerships within the mobility, energy tech, and corporate strategy sectors.

With a Master's degree in Business Administration and a background in Architecture & Urban Planning, I bring a unique blend of expertise to the table. My career journey has seen me lead groundbreaking initiatives across the globe, from Amsterdam and Munich to Delhi and London.

💼 As a CEO, EMEA and General MD at BILITI Electric, I have orchestrated the electrification of logistics and passenger mobility across diverse markets, securing key partnerships and driving successful commercial projects.

🚀 My role as Chief Business & Strategy Officer at Adaptive City Mobility saw me pioneering asset-light business models, forging co-development partnerships, and driving multimillion-dollar agreements, all while shaping the landscape of electric mobility.

🌍 In my role as Mobility Venture Partner at Mobility Fund and Ennea, I've collaborated with global mobility funds, developed strategic theses, and led future strategies for platforms.

🔌 I'm excited about the energy tech revolution. With a robust understanding of energy, water, technology, and regulations, I'm poised to lead as Head of Strategy/CEO/Commercial Head for an energy tech business, driving market intelligence, stakeholder engagement, and compelling strategic narratives.

🌐 My global experiences have enabled me to excel in multicultural environments, where I thrive on forging relationships with C-level executives, stakeholders, and governments.

Let's connect and explore how my passion for innovation, strategic mindset, and deep industry insights can contribute to our shared vision of shaping the future of mobility and energy. Feel free to reach out to me or follow my journey here on LinkedIn!

Connect with me to join the conversation. 🚀

company.name: Soham Renewable Energy India Pvt Ltd

profile_positions.company: Soham Renewable Energy India Pvt Ltd
profile_positions.title: Non Executive Director

profile_positions.description:
Adaptive City Mobility is a revolutionary urban mobility solution that solves the global mass electrification conundrum, now! A combination of lightweight and optimally designed electric vehicles, swappable batteries, energy-as-a-service, & mobility-as-a-service solutions, and data & content plays make it a sustainable, zeroCO2, and extremely lucrative solution. 

As the CBO of the company, my role is to actively develop the growth strategy, build partnerships, promote the solution through thought leadership and demonstrable models/pilots, develop the company from the ground up into a functional team and help internationalize the solution - production/manufacturing, sales & operations, service, and feedback - by targeting the markets with the greatest potential.
profile_positions.title: Chief Business and Strategy Officer

profile_positions.description: Mobility sector Partner at Ennea. Responsibilities and mandates include M&A, consultancy, fundraising, management and board director roles at portfolio companies, and team leadership. Geographical focus on Europe and Asia.
profile_positions.title: Mobility Venture Partner

profile_positions.description:
We transforms big ideas into great products, building the infrastructure for the new era in mobility.

We founded VMC in 2017, driven by a mission. We want to build the technical foundation on which a new mobility paradigm can be build. We work with the brightest minds from the industry. From AI specialists to former bankers and sociologists. One of the reasons we are able to get large and complex done is our team spirit.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board Member

profile_positions.description: Open to entrepreneurial/leadership/consulting roles. Experience in building and transforming businesses, evangelising new concepts especially in urban and mobility sectors, policy, communications, leadership, team building and finance.
profile_positions.title: Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•	India GM of Ofo (a global leader in bike sharing) in India. 1 Mn rides in first 10 weeks of launch
•	Business development with local governments, top officials and ministers at national level, to ensure favorable policy treatment and local support to ofo operations. Successfully convinced cities to drop projects ~US$12.5Mn each, in favor of the ofo model. 
•	Market entry of ofo in South Asia. Incorporation, legal and compliance, brand building, marketing, product localization and expansion.
•	Communications and PR leadership while leveraging the same for policy/business development activities and partnerships. Partnerships secured with major mobility players in the Market on the premise of multimodal value creation.
•	Leading Public Policy within ofo and official spokesperson of ofo in APAC market. Global thought leadership on bicycle sharing & active mobility.
profile_positions.title: Director of Public Policy and Communications

profile_positions.description:
Executive Director, Board of Directors of Trafi Application Private Limited (India subsidiary of TRAFI.com)

- Market entry and incorporation
- Country operations and management
- Compliance and oversight
profile_positions.title: Executive Director, Trafi Application Pvt Ltd

profile_positions.description:
Evangelist for www.trafi.com in India and international markets. Leading strategy, marketing, local business development, data partnerships, user acquisition and relationship building in India, APAC and North America.

Rajarshi helped quickly scale India operations to major cities of India, set up India team and offices and was instrumental in building thought leadership for TRAFI on multimodal transport in India. 

He was instrumental in developing country strategy, overall corporate strategy, marketing plans, PR campaigns and content and overall brand management.

He did due diligence on vendors, acquisition proposals. He also lead B2B sales and channel and data partnerships in the APAC region. He did the complete modelling of payments ecosystem for Mobility as a Service.

At TRAFI, we are on a mission to promote usage of public transportation by making it more predictive and reliable. Our unique platform gives out the information to local commuters so that they can plan their journey with the best combination of time, money and accessibility and also allows local transport authorities to analyse and optimise their public transport to make it more efficient, predictive and reliable.
profile_positions.title: Country Head

profile_positions.description:
Leading the company's foray into the smart cities realm. 

Developing investment strategies and corporate diversification goals.

Engaging with donor funds and international development organisations to further business development in development consultancy

Developing partnerships with academia, international organisations and industry groups to further Infosys as a neutral solution provider and knowledge leader in the smart cities, smart grids and smart growth space. 

Developing design thinking solutions for clients in BFSI, GST-Tax Administration, Energy-Product Innovation contexts.

Leading proposals and responses to bids. Independently prepared bids and managed industry partnerships to deliver client proposals.

Successfully obtained empanelment and prequalification for Infosys on Smart Cities in India.

Promoted within 5 months of joining the company.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant- Management Consulting: Smart Cities, Communications, Entertainment & Media
